name: my-app
description: My App is a continuously updated personal service collection.
author: jinyaoMa

scripts.install:projects:frontend: pnpm frontend:build:icons && pnpm frontend:build:design && pnpm frontend:build:desktop
scripts.install:projects: pnpm install:projects:docs && pnpm install:projects:frontend && pnpm install:projects:backend
scripts.install:chores:certs:bin: mkdirp backend/build/bin/Certs && openssl req -x509 -nodes -days 36524 -newkey rsa:2048 -keyout backend/build/bin/Certs/localhost.key -out backend/build/bin/Certs/localhost.crt -subj "//SKIP=skip/CN=localhost"
scripts.install:chores:certs:air: mkdirp backend/build/air/Certs && openssl req -x509 -nodes -days 36524 -newkey rsa:2048 -keyout backend/build/air/Certs/localhost.key -out backend/build/air/Certs/localhost.crt -subj "//SKIP=skip/CN=localhost"
scripts.install:chores: pnpm install:chores:assets && pnpm install:chores:certs:air && pnpm install:chores:certs:bin
scripts.install:devtools:upx: curl -L -k https://github.com/upx/upx/releases/download/v4.1.0/upx-4.1.0-win64.zip > upx.zip && unzip -p upx.zip '*/upx.exe' > .devtools/upx.exe && rm upx.zip
scripts.install:devtools: pnpm install:devtools:wails && pnpm install:devtools:upx && pnpm install:devtools:swag && pnpm install:devtools:air
scripts.install: pnpm install:devtools && pnpm install:chores && pnpm install:projects
